title: How to purchase RP via mobile purchase in South Africa
body: I bought some Riot Points for the last 2months or so but since the patch recently, I noticed that there isn't a mobile payment option to buy RP in South Africa and the prices are all in Dollars now instead of Rands. Did Riot Games just take away the mobile payment option for South Africa? Please help me....

replies.body:
Hey there!

Checked in on this and it looks like Boku (our mobile payment service provider) suspended service in South Africa last week.  Unfortunately there's no information or estimate on when or if Boku will resume support for South Africa, so at this point the best I could recommend would be to look at alternative payment methods.
Thank You very much for telling me. I really appreciate it. It looks like I shall have to wait until it resumes. Once again, thank you.
I want too buy skins but i can't :( i really hope boku can clear up the problems asap, because i dont have access to other payments methods....
